definitions.definition: Someone who is from the hills ; especially from a rural area, with a connotation of a lack of refinement or sophistication .
A white person from the rural southern part of the United States , especially the Southeastern states.

main_definition: ( often derogatory ) Someone who is from the hills ; especially from a rural area, with a connotation of a lack of refinement or sophistication .
secondary_definitions: ( ethnic slur ) A white person from the rural southern part of the United States , especially the Southeastern states.
